### FAANG Dashboard

This dashboard is automatically rendered and provides brief analysis of the FAANG stocks.

For years, Meta Platforms (META), Amazon (AMZN), Apple (AAPL), Netflix (NFLX) and Alphabet (GOOG, GOOGL) were consistently among the highest-growth stocks in the marketâ€”they were collectively known by the acronym FAANG.  

Each stock page has a [candlestick chart](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Candlestick_chart) and a moving average convergence divergence chart, [MACD](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MACD).
